title: Bug 124620 - Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted
OB: When reopening the report design file after deleting a parameter from the library, the icon of the parameter appears unaffected. However, when similar operations are performed in a dataset, the dataset icon in the report becomes invalid.
EB: Expect that when a parameter is deleted from the library, reopening the report design file should result in the Referenced Parameter icon being marked as invalid.
SR: 1. Insert a report scalar parameter. 2. Create a report using the aforementioned library. In the library explorer, drag the parameter to the data explorer view of the report. 3. Open the library file, delete the parameter. Then, reopen the report design file, and observe that the icon of the parameter appears unaffected.
